Index.title: ELA Annotator
Index.description1: 输入要 Annotate 的内容
Index.slogan: 一写批注就头大？我来帮你！
Index.step0: 粘贴你的 OpenAI API Key
Index.placeholder:
比如：But mostly, I was crying because I was suddenly very
aware of the fact that it was me standing up in that tunnel with the wind over my face.
Index.privacyPolicy1: 请勿上传过于隐私的工作内容，详情查看
Index.paragraphFormPrompt:
Please make an annotation between <|start|>and<|end|>. You need to simplify your answer and write in one paragraph. 

<|start|>
Index.prompt: Please write an annotation for the following content,use markdown point style:
Index.outlineFormPrompt:
Please make an annotation between <|start|>and<|end|>. Use an outline contained with list

<|start|>
Index.notice: 因此网站的使用人数以不可思议的速度飙升，作者无力承担随之而来的运营成本，故决定此网站将在2023-02-15 00:00:00永久下线。有任何问题请通过GitHub上的邮箱联系
